description: Removal of condition 7 of planning permission dated 27 October 2017 (RN: 17/07848/FULL) for Dual use of the basement, ground and first floor as retail (Class A1) and/ or as restaurant (Class A3); Use of second, third and fourth floors as 5 self contained residential units (Class C3); External alterations comprising alterations to the mansard roof to accommodate residential use, installation of a new shopfront, replacement windows and pavement lights and replacement of the kiosk within 15 Little Newport Street to create an escape from the retail/ restaurant unit. (site includes 45-49 Charing Cross Road and 15 Little Newport Street). NAMELY to allow an ancillary take-away function.
